title: Reason for David not contacted Yaming

content.question: According to the letter, why has David been out of touch with Yaming for awhile?

choices.label: He has been doing volunteer work.
He has been working on a museum exhibit.
He has been traveling during summer vacation.
He has been busy since school started.

content.answer: He has been busy since school started.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
